static.globalSearch: Search for specific data from here.
static.floatingFilterInput: Here you can search for specific column-wise data.
static.floatingFilterButton: Here you can filter the data based on different conditions.
static.checkBox: Click on the checkbox to select a particular row.
static.link: This is clickable data; click here to see more details.
static.toggleStatus: Switch this button to allow or disallow actions.

mainButton.filter: After entering specific data, click here to filter it out.
mainButton.upload: From here, you can add data in bulk.
mainButton.download: Click here to download the entire dataset in Excel format. Alternatively, select specific checkboxes to download only the chosen data in Excel format.
mainButton.refresh: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.

actionButton.cost-movement: Check the movement in the cost from here.
actionButton.edit: Click here to edit the data.
actionButton.delete: If the master data is not associated anywhere, you can delete it.
actionButton.copy: If data is not associated anywhere, you can copy the particular data.
actionButton.viewBOM: View the BOM data from here.
actionButton.status: Switch this button to allow or disallow actions.
actionButton.updateAssociatedTechnology: Update the associated technology from here.
actionButton.approve: After approving the data, it will show in the costing breakup details.
actionButton.sapDownload: Download the SAP master in Excel format from here.
actionButton.encodedDownload: Download the encoded master in Excel format from here.
actionButton.cancel: Click here to cancel the rfq.
actionButton.viewProcessGroup: Click here to View the process group.

master_Listing_Tour.searchingBox: Search for specific data from here.
master_Listing_Tour.downloadData: Click here to download the entire dataset in Excel format. Alternatively, select specific checkboxes to download only the chosen data in Excel format.
master_Listing_Tour.uploadData: From here, you can add data in bulk.
master_Listing_Tour.resetGrid: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
master_Listing_Tour.filterData: After entering specific data, click here to filter it out.
master_Listing_Tour.addLimit: You can add limits from here.
master_Listing_Tour.costing_version: Click on the costing version to view costing details from here.
master_Listing_Tour.rfq_version: Click on the RFQ version to view RFQ details from here.
master_Listing_Tour.view_details: Click here if you want to update user details.
